00023 /* Audio Interface Subclass Codes */
00024 #define AUDIO_SUBCLASS_UNDEFINED                0x00
00025 #define AUDIO_SUBCLASS_AUDIOCONTROL             0x01
00026 #define AUDIO_SUBCLASS_AUDIOSTREAMING           0x02
00027 #define AUDIO_SUBCLASS_MIDISTREAMING            0x03
00028 
00029 /* Audio Interface Protocol Codes */
00030 #define AUDIO_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED                0x00
00031 
00032 
00033 /* Audio Descriptor Types */
00034 #define AUDIO_UNDEFINED_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE         0x20
00035 #define AUDIO_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE            0x21
00036 #define AUDIO_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE     0x22
00037 #define AUDIO_STRING_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE            0x23
00038 #define AUDIO_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE         0x24
00039 #define AUDIO_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE          0x25

00041 
00042 /* Audio Control Interface Descriptor Subtypes */
00043 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_UNDEFINED                 0x00
00044 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_HEADER                    0x01
00045 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_INPUT_TERMINAL            0x02
00046 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_OUTPUT_TERMINAL           0x03
00047 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_MIXER_UNIT                0x04
00048 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_SELECTOR_UNIT             0x05
00049 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_FEATURE_UNIT              0x06
00050 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_PROCESSING_UNIT           0x07
00051 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_EXTENSION_UNIT            0x08
00052 
00053 /* Audio Streaming Interface Descriptor Subtypes */

00055 #define AUDIO_STREAMING_GENERAL                 0x01
00056 #define AUDIO_STREAMING_FORMAT_TYPE             0x02
00057 #define AUDIO_STREAMING_FORMAT_SPECIFIC         0x03
00058

00061 #define AUDIO_ENDPOINT_GENERAL                  0x01

00063 
00064 /* Audio Descriptor Sizes */
00065 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_INTERFACE_DESC_SZ(n)      0x08+n
00066 #define AUDIO_STREAMING_INTERFACE_DESC_SIZE     0x07
00067 #define AUDIO_INPUT_TERMINAL_DESC_SIZE          0x0C
00068 #define AUDIO_OUTPUT_TERMINAL_DESC_SIZE         0x09
00069 #define AUDIO_MIXER_UNIT_DESC_SZ(p,n)           0x0A+p+n
00070 #define AUDIO_SELECTOR_UNIT_DESC_SZ(p)          0x06+p
00071 #define AUDIO_FEATURE_UNIT_DESC_SZ(ch,n)        0x07+(ch+1)*n
00072 #define AUDIO_PROCESSING_UNIT_DESC_SZ(p,n,x)    0x0D+p+n+x
00073 #define AUDIO_EXTENSION_UNIT_DESC_SZ(p,n)       0x0D+p+n
00074 #define AUDIO_STANDARD_ENDPOINT_DESC_SIZE       0x09
00075 #define AUDIO_STREAMING_ENDPOINT_DESC_SIZE      0x07

00088 /* Audio Request Codes */

00090 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR                   0x01
00091 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_CUR                   0x81
00092 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MIN                   0x02
00093 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MIN                   0x82
00094 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MAX                   0x03
00095 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MAX                   0x83

00097 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_RES                   0x84
00098 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MEM                   0x05
00099 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MEM                   0x85
00100 #define AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_STAT                  0xFF

00103 /* Audio Control Selector Codes */
00104 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_UNDEFINED                 0x00    /* Common Selector */
00105 
00106 /*  Terminal Control Selectors */
00107 #define AUDIO_COPY_PROTECT_CONTROL              0x01
00108 
00109 /*  Feature Unit Control Selectors */
00110 #define AUDIO_MUTE_CONTROL                      0x01
00111 #define AUDIO_VOLUME_CONTROL                    0x02
00112 #define AUDIO_BASS_CONTROL                      0x03
00113 #define AUDIO_MID_CONTROL                       0x04
00114 #define AUDIO_TREBLE_CONTROL                    0x05
00115 #define AUDIO_GRAPHIC_EQUALIZER_CONTROL         0x06
00116 #define AUDIO_AUTOMATIC_GAIN_CONTROL            0x07
00117 #define AUDIO_DELAY_CONTROL                     0x08
00118 #define AUDIO_BASS_BOOST_CONTROL                0x09
00119 #define AUDIO_LOUDNESS_CONTROL                  0x0A
00120 
00121 /*  Processing Unit Control Selectors: */
00122 #define AUDIO_ENABLE_CONTROL                    0x01    /* Common Selector */
00123 #define AUDIO_MODE_SELECT_CONTROL               0x02    /* Common Selector */
00124 
00125 /*  - Up/Down-mix Control Selectors */
00126 /*      AUDIO_ENABLE_CONTROL                    0x01       Common Selector */
00127 /*      AUDIO_MODE_SELECT_CONTROL               0x02       Common Selector */
00128

00131 /*      AUDIO_MODE_SELECT_CONTROL               0x02       Common Selector */
00132 
00133 /*  - 3D Stereo Extender Control Selectors */

00135 #define AUDIO_SPACIOUSNESS_CONTROL              0x02

00139 #define AUDIO_REVERB_LEVEL_CONTROL              0x02
00140 #define AUDIO_REVERB_TIME_CONTROL               0x03
00141 #define AUDIO_REVERB_FEEDBACK_CONTROL           0x04
00142

00146 #define AUDIO_SHORUS_RATE_CONTROL               0x03
00147 #define AUDIO_CHORUS_DEPTH_CONTROL              0x04
00148

00196 #define AUDIO_FORMAT_AC3_DESC_SIZE              0x0A

00225 /* Predefined Audio Channel Configuration Bits */
00226 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_M                         0x0000  /* Mono */
00227 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_L                         0x0001  /* Left Front */
00228 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_R                         0x0002  /* Right Front */
00229 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_C                         0x0004  /* Center Front */
00230 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_LFE                       0x0008  /* Low Freq. Enhance. */
00231 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_LS                        0x0010  /* Left Surround */
00232 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_RS                        0x0020  /* Right Surround */
00233 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_LC                        0x0040  /* Left of Center */
00234 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_RC                        0x0080  /* Right of Center */
00235 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_S                         0x0100  /* Surround */
00236 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_SL                        0x0200  /* Side Left */
00237 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_SR                        0x0400  /* Side Right */
00238 #define AUDIO_CHANNEL_T                         0x0800  /* Top */

00249 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_DEALY                     0x0080
00250 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_BASS_BOOST                0x0100
00251 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_LOUDNESS                  0x0200

00254 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_ENABLE                    0x0001  /* Common Bit */
00255 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_MODE_SELECT               0x0002  /* Common Bit */
00256

00259 /*      AUDIO_CONTROL_MODE_SELECT               0x0002     Common Bit */

00272 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_REVERB_LEVEL              0x0004
00273 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_REVERB_TIME               0x0008
00274 #define AUDIO_CONTROL_REVERB_FEEDBACK           0x0010
